titleStmt.title: By the King. His Majesties proclamation forbidding all His loving subjects of the counties of Kent, Surrey, Sussex, and Hampshire, to raise any forces without His Majesties consent or to enter into any association or protestation for the assistance of the Rebellion against His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: "C.R." without royal arms.
"Given at Our court at Oxford, this sixteenth day of February, in the eighteenth yeere of Our reigne. God save the King."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
